name: GodHand
description:
Welcome to Ultra Slappers!

The hottest slapping tournament on this side of the coast!

Defeat all opponents and become the GodHand. 

--------------------Controls-----------------------

There is only one. Just mash either the button on screen or spacebar when it tells you to mash.

-------------------Gameplay----------------------

When you start mashing, you have 5 seconds to mash as much as possible to increase the power of your slap to its limits. You can increase your stats such as minimum or maximum power of a slap or the increase of power with each mash. The enemies get stronger with each round and if you die you have to start over.

---------------------Credits------------------------

Music and art used in the game is mainly made manually by me, except the main song made by One Man Symphoy
